Package com.hanggrian.socialview

Class SocialTextView

java.lang.Object
android.view.View
android.widget.TextView
androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView
com.hanggrian.socialview.SocialTextView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener, androidx.appcompat.widget.EmojiCompatConfigurationView, androidx.core.view.TintableBackgroundView, androidx.core.widget.AutoSizeableTextView, androidx.core.widget.TintableCompoundDrawablesView, SocialView
public class SocialTextView extends androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView implements SocialView
TextView with hashtag, mention, and hyperlink support.
